The type of CLUE object. Types of objects are "drawing" "geometry" "image" "table" "text"

Parameters: for geometry: {create, update, delete}. For drawing: name of the model-changing action method. For bar graph: {setPrimaryAttribute, setSecondaryAttribute, setYAxisLabel}
Description: The type of content change. Possible values depends on the tile type.

Parameters: board, image, moveableLine, object, point, polygon, vertex, vertexAngle, circle
Description: Geometry tile: type of content object being modified; "object" used when type is multiple or ambiguous
Geometry tile: ID(s) of objects being operated on

Parameters: drag point, drag segment, drag polygon, join to polygon, rotate, keyboard, paste, duplicate, zoom in, zoom out, fit all, place center/tangent point, join center/tangent point to circle, change color
Description: Geometry tile: method by which the change was requested - eg move can be via dragging or via keyboard command
Geometry tile: type of labeling selected for object. "length" is used for coordinate positions, segment lengths
Geometry tile: text of comment or name of labeled object. Bar graph tile: text of axis label
